Ou voc√™ ter√° que alug√°-los ..  (Original) My daughter had this on her bucket list, so when we had a moment for us girls we went here to fly around and hobbel through the trees. It was a lot of fun, not very high or fast (the zips) but long enough to have fun. The only comment I have is for the staff to assess during instruction how fast each group is, because we ended up going last and were held up by people going very slow.. Other than that, awesome time in the trees! Btw we bought the route 1 plus zips only from route 2 for about $35 each online and I think that‚Äôs the best package üëç oh, and wear sneakers! topComments.author: Tasha Smith

topComments.author: Shannon Miller
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) CUIDADO - Pagamos por ambos os cursos. Chuva come√ßou no final do primeiro curso. Apenas 3 tirolesas conclu√≠das. Infelizmente, eles n√£o nos deixaram come√ßar o segundo curso. Eu sou tudo pela seguran√ßa, mas foi uma garoa sem rel√¢mpagos. Pedimos uma verifica√ß√£o de chuva para retornar mais tarde quando a chuva parou e negou. Eles recusaram um reembolso parcial. Atendimento ao cliente muito ruim. O curso √© definido no parque P√öBLICO, ent√£o voc√™ est√° fazendo tirolesa sobre os sem-teto. ECONOMIZE SEU DINHEIRO e v√° para os c√¢nions em Ocala!  (Original) BEWARE - We paid for both courses. Rain started at end of first course.  Only 3 zip lines completed. Sadly, They would not let us start the second course. I am all for safety but it was a drizzle without lightening. We asked for a rain check to return later when rain stopped and denied. They refused a partial refund. Very poor customer service. The course is set in PUBLIC park so you are zip lining over homeless people. SAVE YOUR MONEY and go to the canyons in Ocala!

topComments.author: Lady Korir
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O lugar pode n√£o ser muito bonito quando voc√™ chega de carro. O parque adjacente √† direita na propriedade tinha dois ou tr√™s personagens question√°veis. Quando voc√™ puxa para se inscrever, voc√™ n√£o v√™ o curso. Os pacotes oferecidos s√£o Curso 1 e Curso 2 de obst√°culos e tirolesa. As pistas de obst√°culos oferecem v√°rios n√≠veis de desafios para aqueles que temem alturas e querem sua adrenalina. Uma sess√£o de treinamento √© dada antes de embarcar no curso que realmente ajuda.  Pr√≥s: - N√£o muito longe da Daytona Motor Speedway - A equipe foi muito simp√°tica e disposta a ajudar. Eles fazem a visita valer a pena  Contras: - Para quem anda e tira fotos, a maior parte do terreno est√° cheio de √°gua, por isso tome cuidado onde pisa - Pessoas rondando o parque, tranque seus objetos de valor e fique atento ao seu redor - Embora voc√™ receba treinamento e a equipe seja simp√°tica, voc√™ √© respons√°vel por sua pr√≥pria seguran√ßa. Eles levam cerca de grupos de 8 por hora, portanto, para 1 funcion√°rio, voc√™ deve se certificar de que est√° prestando aten√ß√£o √†s dicas de seguran√ßa. - Nenhuma sinaliza√ß√£o adequada quando voc√™ chega ao local pela primeira vez - O curso n√£o foi projetado corretamente e voc√™ n√£o saberia onde est√° alguma coisa.  (Original) The place may not be much to look at when you first drive up. The adjacent park right on the property had two or three questionable characters. When you pull up to sign up, you don‚Äôt see the course. The packages offered are Course 1 & Course 2 obstacle course and zip lining. The obstacle courses offer varying degrees of challenges for those fearful of heights to those who want their adrenaline pumping. A training session is given before embarking on the course that really helps.  Pros: - Not far from Daytona Motor Speedway - Staff was very friendly and willing to help. They make the visit worth it  Cons: - For those walking and taking pictures the most of ground is full of water so be careful where you step - People hanging around the park, lock your valuables away and be aware of your surroundings - Though you get training and the staff is nice, you are responsible for your own safety. Per hour they take about groups of 8 so for 1 staff you have to make sure you are paying attention to safety cues. - No proper signage when you first pull up to the site - Course is not properly designed and you wouldn‚Äôt know where anything is.

Both courses take about 2 hours maybe more depending on skill level.

topComments.author: Em Skrip
topComments.comment: Had a great time here. The staff and course was very accommodating for our large group. Great experience for sure!
